title: If Vladimir was a mistake
body: What about {{champion:429}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:157}}  who either dominate the game at professional levels or normal player levels and get nerfed into obscurity like Yasuo and Yorick, or remain peerlessly oppressive the entire game like Vayne and Rumble?

replies.body: Everything being op is also balanced

rumble?  what's a rumble?  isn't it that thing that gets killed every team fight and can't poke you down from behind minions while if you are a champion with any sort of range and tankiness can outtrade him?

you will remember yorick morrey...you will forget him after level 3 XD

kalista is annoying and possibly OP depending upon circumstances

vayne and yasuo kill everyone if their player knows how to handle them

the only basis I can think of is that yasuo, vayne and kalista can all be scripted subtly to be even more op and etc
